item.description:
At the July meetup, we had a discussion of features and functionality that we would like to include on the bostonplone.org site.

At the August meeting, we will have a mini-sprint where we will all roll up our sleeves and actually implement some of the features we discussed at the July meeting.

For a list of items we will work on, see the nascent (and still not officially launched) bostonplone.org website. http://www.bostonplon...

This is a great chance to get your hands dirty with Plone, ask questions of more experienced Plone developers, and contribute to making a great resource for the Boston plone users community.

For more information, see http://www.bostonplon...
item.name: The Boston Plone August Meetup
